title: NAJLEPSZA W TYM KLUBIE
artist: GOMBAO 33 feat. Mata, Wyguś, Tadeo & Szczepan
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Powiedz mi jedno — czy też chcesz razem ze mną odlecieć gdzieś?
lines.translation: Tell me one thing - do you also want to fly away with me?
lines.grammar: Verbs: chcesz, razem, odlecieć (prefix od- affects meaning). Prepositions/case: z/ze + genitive (from/out of). Meaning: 'Tell me one thing - do you also want to fly away with me?'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Jest już ciemno, nie patrzę wstecz — na bezsenność najlepszy lek
lines.translation: It's already dark, I don't look back - the best cure for insomnia
lines.grammar: Verbs: patrzę. Prepositions/case: na + acc (onto) / loc (on). Meaning: 'It's already dark, I don't look back - the best cure for insomnia'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Lubisz k-pop, a ja Twój śmiech — sprawia, że chce mi się za trzech tańczyć wieczność (oh)
lines.translation: You like K-pop, and I like your laugh—it makes me want to dance forever (oh)
lines.grammar: Verbs: lubisz, się, tańczyć. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'You like K-pop, and I like your laugh—it makes me want to dance forever (oh)'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Poleciałem w taki melanż, że mam melodramat
lines.translation: I got into such a mess that I'm having a melodrama
lines.grammar: Verbs: poleciałem (prefix po- affects meaning), mam. Prepositions/case: w/we + acc (into) / loc (in). Meaning: 'I got into such a mess that I'm having a melodrama'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Szósta głosówka na Messenger, nieodebrana
lines.translation: Sixth call on Messenger, unanswered
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: na + acc (onto) / loc (on). Meaning: 'Sixth call on Messenger, unanswered'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Kochanie, przepraszam Cię, wiesz, mhm, głupia sprawa
lines.translation: Honey, I'm sorry, you know, hmm, it's a stupid thing
lines.grammar: Verbs: przepraszam (prefix prze- affects meaning), cię, wiesz (prefix w- affects meaning). Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Honey, I'm sorry, you know, hmm, it's a stupid thing'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Dalej bawię się, choć wiem, że się martwisz
lines.translation: I'm still having fun, even though I know you're worried
lines.grammar: Verbs: bawię, się, martwisz. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I'm still having fun, even though I know you're worried'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Twoje życie nie było łatwe
lines.translation: Your life hasn't been easy
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Your life hasn't been easy'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Daj mi chwilę, wszystko załatwię
lines.translation: Give me a moment, I'll arrange everything
lines.grammar: Verbs: daj, chwilę, załatwię (prefix z- affects meaning). Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Give me a moment, I'll arrange everything'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Moje życie wygląda jaśniej
lines.translation: My life looks brighter
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'My life looks brighter'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Odkąd jesteś w nim na poważnie, mała
lines.translation: Since you're seriously into it, baby
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: w/we + acc (into) / loc (in); na + acc (onto) / loc (on). Meaning: 'Since you're seriously into it, baby'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Jesteś najlepsza w tym klubie w mieście, w województwie
lines.translation: You are the best in this club in the city, in the province
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: w/we + acc (into) / loc (in). Meaning: 'You are the best in this club in the city, in the province'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Na później odłóżmy seks, chcę z Tobą dziecko lub dwójkę, ale to później
lines.translation: Let's leave sex for later, I want a child or two with you, but that's later
lines.grammar: Verbs: chcę, dwójkę. Prepositions/case: na + acc (onto) / loc (on); z/ze + genitive (from/out of). Meaning: 'Let's leave sex for later, I want a child or two with you, but that's later'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Dzisiaj mój cash (mmm) wydam na wszystko, co lubię
lines.translation: Today I will spend my cash (mmm) on everything I like
lines.grammar: Verbs: dzisiaj, wydam (prefix wy- affects meaning), lubię. Prepositions/case: na + acc (onto) / loc (on). Meaning: 'Today I will spend my cash (mmm) on everything I like'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Mm, mm, mm (mm, mm, mm), Ciebie, kasyno i wódę
lines.translation: Mm, mm, mm (mm, mm, mm), you, casino and vodka
lines.grammar: Verbs: wódę (prefix w- affects meaning). Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Mm, mm, mm (mm, mm, mm), you, casino and vodka'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Mam to przeczucie, że Ty chcesz być tą jedną, która
lines.translation: I have this feeling that you want to be the one who
lines.grammar: Verbs: mam, chcesz, być. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I have this feeling that you want to be the one who'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Jest obok mnie, robi cash, buja się po klubach
lines.translation: He's next to me, making cash, hanging out in clubs
lines.grammar: Verbs: się. Prepositions/case: po + loc/acc. Meaning: 'He's next to me, making cash, hanging out in clubs'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Poznałem Cię w Barczewie, wakacje na Mazurach
lines.translation: I met you in Barczewo, vacation in Masuria
lines.grammar: Verbs: poznałem (prefix po- affects meaning), cię. Prepositions/case: w/we + acc (into) / loc (in); na + acc (onto) / loc (on). Meaning: 'I met you in Barczewo, vacation in Masuria'. Aspect and prefixes shift meaning; prepositions choose case.

lines.text: Słodka jak marakuja, wskakuj, mała, na chuja
lines.translation: Sweet as passion fruit, jump in, baby, for fuck's sake
